name: Cheese & Chive
description:
the weird cousin of the Cheese & Onion is here. A brand new scrollable platformer for your Commodore Pet 32k 80 column. 

THE CHEESY UNIVERSE HAS A PROBLEM! FIVE PRINCESSES HAVE BEEN KIDNAPPED!

PUT ON YA GREEN PANTS AND START THE RESCUE, COLLECTING CHIVES ON THE WAY

If you want to buy a physical version : The Future Was 8 Bit
